title: How do I get accepted into PBE?
body: I've been waiting for a while I have the PBE cilent

replies.body: I got accepted into Alpha Client but have been waiting for PBE account for a year and a half now =(
you just apply on that website to sign up, but just be ready to wait, i've been waiting for like a year and a half.

You can sign up for the PBE by going [here](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe)!  If you've already applied, there's no way to expedite an application.  We do have a [PBE FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) that does provide some details on acceptance, such as having an account in good standing.  Best of luck with your application!
